data.title: Robert Wagner
data.meta_description: Robert John Wagner (born February 10, 1930) is a popular American film and television actor, primarily for his roles in movies, soap operas and television. In Austin Powers Robert Wagner plays Number 2, Dr. Evil's right hand man. He oversees the finances of the companies that fund Dr. Evil's...
